summary: Fixes issue for those of use with the glowing ball at the back of your head for 2 handed Dawnbreaker.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first \"mod\" for Skyrim. Well I wouldn\'t really call it a mod, more of a fix of a mod that I really liked, but this small glitch was killing the mod for me. Please feel free to comment or message me on any issues you find with it. I will do what I can to fix it. I know absolutely nothing about modding or modeling. I mainly work with 3D CAD programs. Any help would be appreciated. Also future plans to make this mod work with Neovalen\'s Dual Sheath Redux

To install simply go to your Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Hybrid/Viciousdawnbreaker and overwrite the viciousbastard.nif file

Original files needed to work with this fix
Hybrids Vicisous Dawnbreaker Weapon Pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6383/?
 and Fixed Hybrids Vicious Dawnbreaker Weapon Pack (as my mod only fixes the glowing ball issue, not the disappearing daedric sword)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21084//?

Feel free to use as you will, but please at least give me the credit of the fix.

Credit goes to 
Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh: Original mod
Gizmodian - Vicious heart sword mod Author
Sushiyant for mixing the meshes and some retexturing
Sushiyant for importing it to skyrim
Yaushee aka Mastata: for the orignial Bugfix
author: me
